DOC.brief_summary: The aim current study evaluate effect diet three level dietary fat weight change relate cardiometabolic risk factor 6-month randomized controlled-feeding trial .
DOC.brief_title: Diets With Spectrum Fat Intake Preventing Obesity : A Randomized Controlled-feeding Trial
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Students Zhejiang University work stuff Chinese PLA General Hospital 18 ≤ age ≤ 35 Body Mass Index < 28* Are willing eat study food even full Are willing eat food provide Are willing avoid strenuous activity 6mo intervention Exclusion criteria： Systolic blood pressure ≥ 140 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg Total cholesterol ≥ 239 mg/dL Lowdensity lipoprotein cholesterol ≥ 159 mg/dL Triglycerides ≥ 199 mg/dL Blood glucose ≥ 110 mg/dL Change body weight exceed ± 10 % prior year Energy intake low high Unwillingness special requirement diet could modify Poor adherence recruit meet unsatisfactory completion keep food diary filling questionnaire time randomization Eating disorder psychosocial scheduling factor could impede study outcome Have history diagnose CVD , diabetes , cancer inflammatory disease Have history mental illness Have diagnose endocrine , pulmonary hematological disease Have diagnose bowel disease malabsorption would prevent participant comply dietary restriction feed trial Renal liver insufficiency Other chronic disease think interfere effect diet participation adherence Current use supplement antiinflammation medication medication affect glucose , lipid metabolism blood pressure Smoking alcoholic beverage intake > 1 time per week Current plan pregnancy prior end study , breastfeed Irregular menstrual cycle Have birth control medication
